about_the_game:
《Story》


Toshiro is an ordinary office worker blessed with a wife and child.
One day, he receives word that his mother has suddenly passed away, and he returns to his hometown with his family.
When he gets there, it turns out that his father got ahead of himself, and his mother is very much still alive.
Since he came all the way there, he decided to stay with his family for a little while to visit.

While there, he happens to run into his childhood friend, Akiho.
Despite how long it's been, their friendship is rekindled instantly, and when the conversation heads in a dirty direction, Akiho says something shocking.

"Hey, it's been a while, so why don't you show me something nice? It'll be fun.
You showed me it before, so it should be no problem, right? I bet it's pretty hard!"

They indeed used to show each other their genitals as a joke.
But that was just because they were too young to know any better.

"You had too much to drink, didn't you? Here, I'll take you back to your place, let's go."

Since Akiho seems to be pretty drunk, she won't listen to Toshiro's attempts to calm her down…

《Characters》


Akiho Miyashida (VA: Hina Shinomiya)
"Hehe, don't worry! You can break up with your wife and become mine! Just joking! I'd never actually suggest that."

Toshiro's friend from childhood.
She moved to Tokyo for university and married a man she met there.
After that, she returned to her hometown and became a housewife.
She's fully satisfied with her life in the countryside.
While she loves her predictable daily routine, there is a part of her that feels stifled.
She and her husband maintain a healthy sex life.

Toshiro Fujishiro
An old friend of Akiho's.
He lost contact with Akiho after she moved to Tokyo, and they became distant.

*Before purchasing this product, we highly recommend you play the demo [Japanese only] to check if the game works properly on your computer in your region.
*Appetite is the licensor of this game. For inquiries about the product, please get in contact with Tensei Games.

《Contents》

  • 15 separate CGs (60 CGs in total!)
  • 15 H-scenes
  • Japanese voice acting for the main female character

《Features》

  • You can have the same experience as the protagonist.
  • Three endings
  • CG Gallery Mode
  • Scene Replay Mode

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and sexual scenes. Within those, there are also scenes that are possible to be interpreted as sexual violence or non-consensual sex.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron (2010) or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720 Full Color
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i series or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720 Full Color
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound

short_description: This is a low-priced practical erotic game. Toshiro is an office worker with a wife and child. One day, he returns to his hometown and stays with his family to visit. There, he runs into his childhood friend, Akiho. Despite how long it's been, their friendship is rekindled instantly.
